Reviews.Title: “Difficult to find in the dark!”
Reviews.Author: Bash07
Reviews.Content: firstly taxi airport dropped wrong hotel thankfully local petrol station spoke fluent english able hotel hotel majestic ran looked worse outside nosy hear traffic outside night despite breakfast lovely staff helpful helping getting city overall cheap

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: s0ller
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 6th 9th admit bit apprehensive reading reviewsbut worries loved location close road found staff hotel nicea special thank nigel occasion berlin return majestic hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money”
Reviews.Author: jcfc33
Reviews.Content: decent clean hotel ideal base city break comfortable adequate hotel staff friendly helpful typical tourist information nigel particular informative courteous englishman communication issue breakfast adequate cheese cold ham fake oj variety breads etc coffee hotel bar 3 euros tasty german beer hotel situated pleasant called west city underground station outside hotel central station travel berlin cheaply quickly walking distance kurfurstendam main shopping avenue regular buses overall decent value money exploring wonderful city berlin time

Reviews.Title: “wow, a gem for the price”
Reviews.Author: shilo-ann
Reviews.Content: arrived expecting price pleasantly surprised basic clean bed pillows comfortable restaurants street laundromat supermarket train station road located hotel staff friendly bar downstairs breakfast ok coffee lovely lift goes fourth floor fifth prepare carry bags stairs

Reviews.Title: “Close to the Underground & has a great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: MrsJaggs
Reviews.Content: breakfast selection meat cheese bread cereal yoghurt fruit eggs bacon tea coffee delicious hot chocolate close underground wish easily beds uncomfortable moving slats ok staff spoke reception desk didnt understand english ok

Reviews.Title: “I liked it”
Reviews.Author: eddie1987
Reviews.Content: basic hotel wasnt bad english guy desk germans sometimes hear traffic morning wasnt location underground station hotel drinks pretty cheap aswell 4 euro vodka coke 3 euro lager

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Majestic
HotelInfo.Address: Brandenburgischer Strasse 47, 10707 Berlin, Germany
